title: Increase CRETH2 Collateral Factor to 45%
body:
## Summary
Increase CRETH2 collateral factor from 0% to 45% (C4)

**For**: Increase CRETH2 collateral factor to 45% (C4)
**Against**: Do nothing

## Motivation
The main idea has been elaborated in the [CRETH2 listing proposal](https://forum.cream.finance/t/list-creth-as-collateral-asset/171).

CRETH2 is the proof token for staking ETH in C.R.E.A.M. Finance, and the borrowing power from the staked position plays an important part of motives for C.R.E.A.M. users to stake in ETH2. By allowing this, CRETH2 will attract more ETH staking and the protocol will get more TVL eventually.

Discussion link: https://forum.cream.finance/t/increase-creth2-collateral-factor-to-45/193
author: 0xb6e362900B7113F246A7e1c17E9746b3B9C079dB
